actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize construction of the flood control project on the Aumbo River at Rochester, Minnesota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a flood control project on the Zumbro River, at Rochester, Minnesota. Requires that certain changes be accomplished entirely.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of the flood control project on the Aumbo River at Rochester, Minnesota.
